page.title: 15Alston Play Group, A. Moor
page.content: The Play Group meets in The Topp on Wednesday and Friday mornings from 9.a.m. to 11.30a.m. There are 29 members and the group is organised by {a group of mothers.} The belong to the {Pre-school Playgroup Association.} The committee plan how to raise money and what to buy with it. Special people are employed to look after the children. Children can start going to the playgroup when they are three and they leave when they start school. They play with cars, playdough, sand, water, jigsaws, the rocking horse, the slide and the climbing frame. They also have an outing and the older chaildren visit the reception class at school before they are due to begin school.
